author: Novelty
title: Light up
review: A large variety of transparent coloured bricks, 2 lights and some cables comes in this set.  The downside is that there's no battery box so it doesn't work on its own.  Combine this with a battery box (say the one from 810) and it can be nifty for lighting up houses and space stations and all sorts of creations.

author: desser1
title: great addition of ambience
review:
I always loved the set because it added a lot of ambience to my city. The set contains a lot of useful parts:
each of 2 1x2x1 transparent bricks in yellow, red, blue and green
two lightning bricks like from 7867 but with yellow housing
one 1x6x1 transparent brick in blue with "police" writing
one 1x6x1 transparent brick in greenwith "taxi" writing
one 1x6x1 transparent brick in red with a cup and cutlery print for builting a restaurant
2 short and 2 long cables for 4.5 V system
2 very useful 1x2x1 bricks in red with exclosures to lead cables through walls

All in all a very useful set. If you find it get it!
